value:
$WmMPID_サナキ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|This way, Lady Altina!$k$p$nMPID_双界オルティナ|Sanaki, wait! There's no need to run.$k$p$nMPID_サナキ|But the way this tree is decorated
is just so beautiful, and I'm excited
for you to see it...$k$p$nMPID_双界オルティナ|My... You're right. It is beautiful,
isn't it? Thank you, Sanaki. I'm glad
to have seen such a sight.$k$p$nMPID_サナキ|Hee hee!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セフェラン,ch09_23_Sepheran_M_Winter20,Face|Ah, there you are, Lady Sanaki.
I was wondering where you'd gone
off to...$k$p$WmMPID_双界オルティナ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|...Y-you! You're—$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セフェラン,ch09_23_Sepheran_M_Winter20,Face|I, er—$k$p$WmMPID_サナキ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|Sephiran! Where do you think
you're going?!$k$pHow could you run away from Lady
Altina like that?! Get back here!$k$p$nMPID_双界オルティナ|It can't be. He...he can't be...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_サナキ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|Sephiran! Where did you run off to?
Ugh... And during a festival!$k$p...Hm? Someone hiding over there?
Hah! It's you, isn't it, Sephiran?
You can't hide from me!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_Winter20,Face|Waaahhh! Wh-who are you?! I'm not
hiding from gift duty, I swear!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_サナキ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|Seriously, now... Where could
he have gone? Come out this
instant, Sephiran!$k$p$Sbs150|
